content: Our second quarter financial results were strong with record revenue of $11.8 million compared to $10.1 million in the year ago period, an increase of $1.7 million or 17%. R&D expense was approximately $2.3 million compared to $1.6 million in the year ago period, an increase of $700,000 or 39%,  $2.3 million and overall increase is in line with guidance provided. Sales and marketing expense was $1.6 million compared to $1.3 million in a year ago period, an increase of $300,000 or 22%. Our G&A expense was at $1.6 million for the quarter compared to $1.2 million a year ago, a 36% increase. In total, our cash based expenses were $11 million for the second quarter of fiscal 2022 compared to $9.7 million in the same period last year, an increase of approximately $1.3 million or 14% with the increases primarily stemming from investment for future growth.
